entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT publishing with MSBuild doesn't work with .NET 8 SDK #89659
  • ETW need a mechanism to get an activity_id #89657
    9.0.0
  • Consider a better implementation for ep_rt_aot_thread_get_id #89650
    9.0.0
  • ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics uses AttachCurrentThread #89649
  • [API Proposal]: Create vectors of lower dimension from vectors of higher dimension #89647
  • StreamWriter keeps working after being disposed if `leaveOpen: true` is used #89646
    Future
  • [Crossgen2] Stack overflow in Crossgen2 compilation of the test src/tests/Loader/classloader/generics/regressions/DD117522/Test.csproj #89645
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Future of Numerics and AI - Provide a downlevel `System.Numerics.Tensor` class #89639
  • [browser][perf] Blazor startup regression #89631
    8.0.0
  • Improve cleanup of EventPipe/DiagnosticServer resources during shutdown. #89629
    9.0.0
  • [mono/wasm] regression in IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #89624
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe shutdown race condition in .net7/.net6 #89621
  • superpmi-collect fails with "module 'asyncio' has no attribute 'get_running_loop'" #89618
  • ICorProfiler ELT hooks need tested with UnmanagedCallersOnly methods #89617
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Merge LLVM and non-LLVM code paths in emit_vector_2_3_4 #89616
    Future
  • [mono] Issues with handling nested generic structures during generic sharing #89613
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Tag thread specific information to events #88790
    8.0.0
  • _NoLogging methods in VM #89634
    Future
  • [JIT] Splitting `instrDesc` for EVEX encoded instruction #87016
    8.0.0
  • JsonConverter.Read call inside another converter throws InvalidOperationException: Cannot skip tokens on partial JSON. #74108
    8.0.0
  • Polymorphic deserialization of a composite collection throws NullReferenceException #85934
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Byte> #81227
    8.0.0
  • 6 Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.(Min/Max) #88482
    8.0.0
  • Add a counter for gen0 budget #74217
    8.0.0
  • Add opmask (k) registers to the register allocator #80823
    9.0.0
  • Injected or scoped ServiceProvider does not support Keyed services #89447
  • Native AOT cross-build for iOS cannot find 'libproc.h' file #89625
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Java-like throws keyword in method signature #89622
  • [mono][ios] MarshalingPInvokeScanner fails with PE image does not have metadata #89429
    8.0.0
  • [mono] The bitcast test fails with exit code 104 on apple mobile platforms #89385
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify System.Numerics.Vector4 API's with mini JIT on Arm64 #86957
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Android] App crashes with InvalidProgramException #78833
    8.0.0
  • HttpWebRequest.MaximumResponseHeadersLength Property doesn't support -1 contrary to the docs #88524
    Future
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Caching #43868
  • [wasm][debugger] Firefox test failure `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.InspectPropertiesOfObjectFromExternalLibrary` #89602
    8.0.0
  • Wrong line numbers in exception stack trace on macOS/arm64 #81526
    8.0.0
  • Analyzer: Report inefficient use of sets. #85490
    8.0.0
  • Enable RIP-relative addressing for JIT access to class statics on x64 non-windows #8545
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Globalization Invariant string comparisons with ordinal ignore casing #89660
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] CI: Don't run chrome debugger tests on runtime-wasm if they #89658
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Rename UnrollEqualsStartsWIth to UnrollEqualsStartsWith #89656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use latest ILC to AOT-compile ILC #89655
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • SPMI: Gracefully handle recorded EE-side exceptions during replay #89654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove some manual test scaffolding #89653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable new analyzer CA1868: 'Unnecessary call to 'Contains' for sets' and fix findings #89652
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • [Draft] Re-enabling eventlog tests to verify behavior #89644
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Use new name of the ignorelist switch. #89643
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono]: Fix Windows static build to not export MONO_API symbols. #89642
    area-Build-mono
  • Add file-scoped class trimming test #89640
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Properly implement `System.Linq.Expressions` substitutions according to the recent refactoring #89638
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ARM64] Use SHRN in SpanHelpers.CountValueType #89632
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Add more verifications in EventPipe rundownvalidation test. #89623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • [release/7.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89620
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89619
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add JsonContent.Create overloads which accept JsonTypeInfo #89614
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI: Add support for running WBT with multithreaded runtime installed too #89611
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix host debug view not showing services before start #89610
    area-Extensions-Hosting

Merged

  • Tag events with thread specific information #89516
    8.0.0
  • Remove _NoLogging methods from VM #89641
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Do not consider BADCODE as a replay failure #89626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] dispose more JS proxies #89559
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix build failure on main: remove unused var #89648
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add some checks for merged test groups #89521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Add prefix load environment variable for correct assembly path resolution #89572
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Ensure built-in converters can skip JSON values when invoked via custom converters in async deserialization. #89637
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix collection deserialization in polymorphic objects. #89635
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][sgen] Log also size of reserved empty major blocks #88825
    area-GC-mono
  • Gen0 Budget counter #89412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implement IKeyedServiceProvider interface on ServiceProviderEngineScope #89509
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Re-enable event tracing feature on NativeAOT/iOS and fix PalCreateDump.cpp build #89627
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't include empty prefix with EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider #89612
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add implicit conversion of floating-point call args #89428
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Enabled Ctor, Set_Item and Get_Item Vector4 intrinsics for miniJIT on ARM64 #89501
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix second pass of MarshallingPInvokeScanner with metadata-free DLLs #89555
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][android] Always include marshal-ilgen #89564
    os-android, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make a copy of 'clrjit' binary for use in SuperPMI collect to avoid heap errors when the same 'clrjit' binary is used #89473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ProfileEnter / ProfileLeave #88134
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix issue with being able to MakeGenericMethod methods on generic types #89615
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Enable TLS field access optimization #89561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove extraneous quotation marks and other doc fixes #89528
    needs-area-label
  • Add more doc comments that were missing #89597
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix test failing on firefox #89607
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix arm64 line numbers in stacktraces #89604
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [Perf] Cache key size in CngKey #89599
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • [browser] Integrate DevServer into WasmAppHost #88985
    arch-wasm, area-Host, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Read `AssetTraitValue` to get culture for resource during webcil transformation #89600
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Flow binder gen diag locations correctly & pick up more bind input patterns #89537
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor #89435
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2231640 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update Workflow instruction for codespace #89368
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Inconsistent DebuggerDisplay formatting - Fix space, equal for name/value and Indirect Value #89370
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary "return 100"s from tests #89550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove Crossgen2's -O option in Test Builds Wherever Possible #89223
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add Info warning for int return values #89601
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [nodejs][http] remove active issue 86326 #89588
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Upgrade DNNE to build incrementally #89594
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Stop using computed RID for RUNTIME_IDENTIFIER property #89598
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip during AOT compilation of library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add BinaryData.ContentType #87744
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add MediaType to BinaryData #89605
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Added IAsyncDisposable to TextReader #89477
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add top level statement trimming tests #89606
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Fix ABI and Interop issues with InlineArray types #89519
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove _isBlocked constraint from StreamReader.Peek() #89609
    area-System.IO
  • Create docs transport package and turn on extensions source of truth #89312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization Implement missing cases for GlobalizationNative_GetLocaleInfoString #89296
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add [DebuggerGuidedStepThrough] to new invoker methods #89596
    area-System.Reflection, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [browser] high level documentation of WASM features #89469
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Fix more memory leaks in aot+interp mode. #89580
    needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix EventLog test CanReadAndWriteMessages #89586
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a bunch of DWARF errors #89488
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
